p: In this review, we describe various approaches currently available, or under development, for diagnosis of common respiratory virus infections in humans. It is anticipated that these data will assist clinical laboratories to rapidly and accurately diagnose respiratory viruses, thus providing physicians with essential information for timely and appropriate treatment of patients.
